title: Luxury House for sale in Katubedda
details:
2 Storied Tiled House Around 2250 Sqft Situated at Katubedda.3Bed
Rooms,2 Attached Bath Rooms,Pantry, Kitchen, Living Area,Dining Area, Garage, (Can Park 2 Vehicles) Private Balcony & Garden.Highly Residential Area. 20 Feet-Wide Road Access,700 Mts to Galle Road.(Walking Distance) Giving on highest Offer.

This property is sale due to migration.
